channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Spring 2025 Rensselaer Handbook of Student Rights and Responsibilities Now Available
item.description: As we head into the new semester, the Dean of Students Office wants to remind students to review the Rensselaer Handbook of Student Rights and Responsibilities, which contains only one change for Spring 2025 regarding the campus sign policy.
item.author: Students

item.title: Applications Open for CMDIS BYOND Build Your Own Nano Device Program
item.description: Date: Tuesday, January 7, 2025 12:00 AM - Wed , January 22, 2025 5:00 PM - The Center for Materials, Devices and Integrated Systems’ Micro and NanoFabrication Clean Room offers a four-module certificate program for undergraduates, an exciting opportunity for those planning to pursue a graduate degree or those looking to prepare for a professional career in microelectronics, medical, and energy industries. Applications for the Spring Term are due by January 22.
item.author: Students

item.title: Registrar: Add/Drop (No W Grade) Deadline is January 20
item.description: The Registrar’s Office reminds students that the Spring 2025 add/drop (no W grade) deadline is January 20, 2025; students will be able to drop courses after this date, but will be issued a W grade. More detailed add/drop information is available via the Registrar’s Office website.
item.author: Students

item.title: OGE Online Workshop to Offer Tips for Dissertation, Thesis Preparation and Submission
item.description: Wednesday, January 22, 2025 12:00 PM - 1:30 PM - Learn the basics of correct thesis organization and format, appropriate paper attribution and reference citation styles—plus a review of the most commonly found mistakes and ways to avoid them. This workshop is for any student who will be writing an MS thesis or PhD dissertation, so be sure to register and bring your questions!
item.author: Students

item.title: First Part of Student MHFA Certification Training Being Offered January 24
item.description: Date: Friday, January 24, 2025 2:00 PM - 5:00 PM - The Mueller Center Campus Recreation and Wellness team will be offering Mental Health First Aid (MHFA) certification trainings for students. If you have questions about this event, please contact Emma Atkinson in the Mueller Center.
item.author: Students

item.title: Select Collegiate Store Outerwear on Sale January 8-13
item.description: The Rensselaer Collegiate Store will have a sale on select outerwear from Wednesday, January 8, 2025 until Monday, January 13, when you can enjoy 20% off on select winter outerwear in the store and online. Come into the Store and see what you can save!
item.author: Community

item.title: TIAA Offering Confidential In-Person Retirement Counseling January 15
item.description:
Date: Wednesday, January 15, 2025 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM - A TIAA Financial Consultant will be available for one-on-one consultations on a broad range of retirement topics. Attend this upcoming event to help you become better informed and more confident about Rensselaer’s retirement benefits!

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
